sentences.en: Around the industrialized world, the seeds of oil displacement are already visible.
sentences.cn: 在工业发达世界的各个地方, 石油被取代的苗头已经显现.

sentences.en: But in the industrialized world, farming became more of a regulated business.
sentences.cn: 但是在工业化的世界里, 农业生产变得不仅是一项普通管理工作.

sentences.en: China's education should take the road of industrialized management.
sentences.cn: 中国教育要走产业化经营的道路.

sentences.en: Industrialized countries must reduce carbon dioxide emissions.
sentences.cn: 工业化国家必须减少二氧化碳的排放。

sentences.en: Industrialized, city is changed, commercialize, internationalization still is supporting Chinese economy.
sentences.cn: 工业化 、 城市化 、 市场化 、 国际化仍然支撑着中国经济.

sentences.en: It also fit for industrialized production and will have a good market.
sentences.cn: 其工艺技术可行,成本低,适于工业化生产,有着良好的市场前景.

sentences.en: Major industrialized economies are expected to see the biggest decreases The I. M.
sentences.cn: 大多数工业化经济体预计会经历最大的一次经济下滑,约为4%.

sentences.en: Nuclear power for civil use should be industrialized.
sentences.cn: 民用核电向产业化方向发展.

sentences.en: One of the last food - processing activities to become industrialized was baking.
sentences.cn: 面包和糕饼的焙制,是最后被工业化了的食品之一.

sentences.en: Pollution is the price we pay for an overpopulated, over - industrialized planet.
sentences.cn: 污染是我们为这个人口过密, 过度工业化的星球所付出的代价.

sentences.en: Pollution is the price we pay for an overpopulated, over industrialized planet.
sentences.cn: 污染就是我们为这个人口过密, 过度工业化的星球所付出的代价.

sentences.en: Pollution is the price we pay for overpopulated, over industrialized planet.
sentences.cn: 污染就是我们这个人口过密 、 过度工业化的星球所付出的代价.

sentences.en: Stalin's methods had industrialized the Russian economy.
sentences.cn: 斯大林采取的措施使俄国经济实现了工业化。

sentences.en: This highly - industrialized area is notorious for pollution and general atmospheric bleakness.
sentences.cn: 这个高度工业化的地区因为污染和灰暗的大气层而臭名昭著.

sentences.en: Under these conditions, ethnic family patterns were slowly broken down by an increasingly urbanized, industrialized environment.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,由于都市化 、 工业化的日益发展, 种族家庭的模式缓慢地解体.

sentences.en: While poor countries removed subsidies, industrialized powers maintained high subsidies.
sentences.cn: 当穷国去除补贴时, 已工业国大国仍维持高额补贴.

words.tran_cn: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的
产业主义，工业主义；工业制度
实业家；工业家；产业工人

trans.tran_en: an industrialized country or place has a lot of factories, mines etc

trans.tran_cn: 使工业化(industrialize的过去式和过去分词)，将…组成产业
